title: Senior DevOps Engineer
content:
At NICE, we don’t limit our challenges. We challenge our limits. Constantly. We’re relentless. We’re ambitious. And we make an impact. Our NICErs bring their A game and spend each day turning it into an A+. And if you’re like us, we can offer you the kind of challenge that will light a fire within you. 
This is a unique opportunity to work with cutting-edge cloud and AI technologies. You will build cloud-based services for a new PaaS using AWS and K8S technology.
The new platform will serve developers to create solutions for the largest financial institutions in the world to fight, prevent, and manage financial crime.
Responsibilities 

Own system design and cost-efficient architecture for our cloud-native platform service.
Design and implement central observability and governance solutions for multi-tenant, multi-workload AWS cloud environments.
Design, Implement, and manage CI/CD pipelines on various environments up to production.
Build and maintain a cloud-native platform Infrastructure following the "infrastructure as code" principle.
Lead POC and tech selection processes from idea to implementation.
Consult and advise R&D, and CloudOps/SRE teams to confirm operability, reliability, and efficiency specifications are achieved.
Solve technical, business, and process-related challenges.
Interface and work closely with various R&D Groups (Architects, Developers, Product Managers).
Deliver and share knowledge and the DevOps mindset across the organization.
Automate everything.

 Requirements 

At least five years of hands-on DevOps experience - a must
Expert-level AWS development and solution architecture capabilities - a must
Expert level in Docker and Kubernetes technologies and eco-system - a must
Advanced Linux system administration skills – a must
Experience with at least one programming language Bash/Python/Java/Groovy - a must
Hands-on implementation of Continuous Integration and Continuous Delivery in complex cloud-native products.
Experience with monitoring and log analysis tools such as ELK, Prometheus, Grafana, Datadog, etc.
Experience using Infrastructure as Code (IaC) tools such as Terraform – a must
Cloud operations in production experience – an advantage
Experience with Jenkins – an advantage
Development experience – an advantage
Passion for new technologies, capable of learning new technologies quickly
Great interface management with peers and managers, team player
Excellent English, ability to communicate fluently with peers abroad

  Education

Computer Science BSc/BA degree or equivalent experience – an advantage
#LI-Hybrid


 About NICE 
NICE Ltd. (NASDAQ: NICE) software products are used by 25,000+ global businesses, including 85 of the Fortune 100 corporations, to deliver extraordinary customer experiences, fight financial crime and ensure public safety. Every day, NICE software manages more than 120 million customer interactions and monitors 3+ billion financial transactions. 
Known as an innovation powerhouse that excels in AI, cloud and digital, NICE is consistently recognized as the market leader in its domains, with over 8,500 employees across 30+ countries. 
NICE is proud to be an equal opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, national origin, age, sex, marital status, ancestry, neurotype, physical or mental disability, veteran status, gender identity, sexual orientation or any other category protected by law.
